process_overview.name: BizBanking Client Onboarding
process_overview.purpose: End-to-end process for onboarding new BizBanking clients (businesses with annual turnover up to €10M) from initial application through account activation
triggers: New client completes online application via Business Portal
RM submits paper application on behalf of walk-in client
Referral from branch network with completed application pack

roles.responsibilities: Initial client contact, application gathering, client communication
Identity verification, document validation, risk assessment
Financial assessment, credit decisioning (if overdraft requested)
Account setup, system configuration, card ordering
Enhanced Due Diligence reviews, PEP/Sanctions escalations

process_steps.name: Application Receipt & Initial Triage
sub_steps: Receive application notification in CRM queue
If incomplete, send Missing Documents email template
If complete, create case in Onboarding Workflow System
process_steps.rationale: Ensure complete applications enter pipeline, reject incomplete early

process_steps.name: KYC & Identity Verification
sub_steps: Verify company registration via CRO portal
Screen directors and UBOs (World-Check, internal lists, adverse media)
Verify ID documents using IDV platform
If High Risk or PEP → escalate to Compliance
Document all verification steps in audit trail

process_steps.name: Credit Assessment
sub_steps: Pull credit bureau report for company and directors
Calculate key ratios (DSCR, current ratio, gearing)

process_steps.name: Account Setup & Configuration
sub_steps: Create customer master record in CBS
process_steps.rationale: Enable client to transact, complete product setup

process_steps.name: Client Communication & Activation
sub_steps: Send Welcome Email with account details
Schedule welcome call within 5 business days
process_steps.rationale: Client engagement, ensure smooth activation, relationship building

process_steps.name: Post-Onboarding Quality Check
sub_steps: Feedback to team member if issues
Escalate systemic issues to Process Owner

exceptions.name: Incomplete Documentation
exceptions.trigger: Required documents missing after initial submission
exceptions.handling: 2 reminders over 10 days, then RM escalation, auto-expire at 20 days

exceptions.name: KYC Screening Hit
exceptions.handling: Compliance Officer review required; PEP=EDD, Sanctions=MLRO escalation
exceptions.impact: HIGH - Potential regulatory breach if missed

exceptions.name: Credit Decline
exceptions.trigger: Credit assessment fails scorecard or policy
exceptions.handling: RM notification to client, offer account-only alternative

exceptions.name: System Downtime
exceptions.handling: BCP manual process, log entries for reconciliation

exceptions.name: Complex Ownership Structure
exceptions.handling: Senior KYC Analyst review, legal review for trusts

pain_points.name: Manual document chasing
pain_points.description: No automated reminders for missing documents, relies on manual tracking. Average 2-3 follow-ups per application.

pain_points.name: System switching / No single client view
pain_points.description: Staff must access 6+ systems during onboarding. Copy-paste between systems leads to data entry errors.

pain_points.name: KYC screening false positives
pain_points.description: World-Check generates ~40% false positives requiring manual review. Common names particularly problematic.

pain_points.name: Paper-based signatures
pain_points.description: Many clients still submit paper applications. Manual digitization creates 1-2 day delay.

pain_points.name: Credit bureau delays
pain_points.description: Bureau response times vary (instant to 24hrs). No visibility on when data will be available.

pain_points.name: Welcome call scheduling
pain_points.description: RMs struggle to reach clients. Average 3 attempts before successful contact. No self-service scheduling option.

controls.name: Customer Identification
controls.description: ID verification for all directors and UBOs

controls.name: Beneficial Owner Identification
controls.description: Identification of all UBOs with 25%+ ownership

controls.name: Data Protection Consent
controls.description: Privacy notice and data processing consent obtained

controls.name: Strong Customer Authentication
controls.description: SCA implemented for online banking setup

gaps_for_elicitation: Decision point criteria not explicit (e.g., what determines Standard vs Complex?)
Pain point root causes not analyzed
System integration details missing (API vs manual)
Data flow between systems not mapped
Actual vs target SLA performance not documented
